meanings.definition: A person who greets others with pleasure or courtesy.
meanings.sent1: The welcomers at the party greeted everyone with big smiles.
meanings.sent2: The welcomers at the event made sure to greet each guest warmly.
meanings.sent3: The welcomers at the airport even welcomed the lost luggage with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The welcomers in the small town were like rays of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The welcomers in the new neighborhood made everyone feel like they belonged instantly.

meanings.sent2: The welcomers at the restaurant greeted customers with friendly faces.
meanings.sent3: The welcomers at the zoo even welcomed the escaped animals back with open arms.
meanings.sent4: The welcomers in the community center were like beacons of hospitality.
